comments.body: as we always have sbt on classpath, isn't it simpler to simply use the one provided by sbt instead of maintaining a copy of it?

When running dotty outside of sbt, we only have `"org.scala-sbt" % interface` (which only contains Java interfaces) on the classpath, `ShowAPI.scala` is in `"org.scala-sbt" % api` which will only be on the classpath when running dotty from sbt, but we want `-Ydump-sbt-inc` to work without running dotty from sbt to make debugging easier.
